inputSpec.name: obj1
inputSpec.label: DXObject
inputSpec.help: link to the first object to be compared.

inputSpec.name: obj2
inputSpec.label: DXObject
inputSpec.help: link to the second object to be compared.

inputSpec.name: compare_social
inputSpec.label: Compare Social Metadata
inputSpec.help: Optional (default is false); a boolean representing whether to compare 'social' data (name, tags, properties).

inputSpec.name: mask_links
inputSpec.label: Equate links and dxlinks
inputSpec.help: Optional (default is true); a boolean representing whether links `{$dnanexus_link:...}` in details will be masked out prior to comparing details.
